forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this morning becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. Thunder possible. High 13C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this morning becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. Thunder possible. High 57F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms early, then variable clouds overnight with still a chance of showers. Low 8C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms this evening followed by occasional showers overnight. Low 49F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 13C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 58F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 9C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 51F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High 12C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning with some clearing in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds late. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 12C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High around 55F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 56F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 12C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 57F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 57F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 57F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low near 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 59F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.
